title: Lust Stories 2
description: Four eminent Indian directors explore sex, desire and love through short films in this sequel to 2018's Emmy-nominated 'Lust Stories'

title: F9: The Fast Saga
description: Dominic Toretto and the crew race to foil a civilization-threatening plot led by an elite criminal — who also happens to be Dom's own brother.

title: Afwaah
description: A woman seeks to escape her engagement to a violent politician, but when a stranger comes to her aid, the two face an onslaught of bigotry and hate.

title: Sing 2
description: Buster Moon and his musically gifted friends must persuade the reclusive rock star Clay Calloway to join them for the opening of their new show.

title: Nobody
description: A thankless job, disrespectful kids and passionless marriage suffocate a middle-aged everyman — until a home invasion awakens his lethal inner badass.

title: The Boss Baby: Family Business
description: Templeton brothers Ted and Tim keep it all in the family and team up with Tim's daughter, Tina, to thwart a dastardly villain's plot.

title: The Forever Purge
description: After the annual night of anarchy spirals out of control, two families must stand against the ruthless killers striving to take over the country.
starring: Starring:Ana de la Reguera,Tenoch Huerta,Josh Lucas

title: Old
description: When a family vacations at a secluded beach, they're horrified to discover its power to quicken the aging process, slashing their life span to one day.

title: Nimona
description: A knight framed for a tragic crime teams with a scrappy, shape-shifting teen to prove his innocence. But what if she's the monster he's sworn to destroy?
starring: Starring:Chloë Grace Moretz,Riz Ahmed,Eugene Lee Yang

title: Sniper: Rogue Mission
description: A CIA rookie, a grizzled vet and a female assassin set off on a rogue mission to take down a corrupt federal agent running a human trafficking ring.
